mapper.update:
update alarm
msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_num = #{sendNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
section_id = #{sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alarmcode = #{alarmcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=INTEGER},

alarmlevel = #{alarmlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update alarm set msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_num = #{sendNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, section_id = #{sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarmcode = #{alarmcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserved2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarmlevel = #{alarmlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_time = #{platformTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recover_time = #{recoverTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, fault_status = #{faultStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dispose_status = #{disposeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idea = #{idea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_ticket_id =#{alarmTicketId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: a.id as a_id, msg_id, send_num, createtime, station_id, section_id, alarmcode, reserved1, reserved2,alarmlevel, platform_time, recover_time, status, fault_status, dispose_status,idea, remark,alarm_ticket_id, qb.qdid ,qb.quDuanYunYing_name, c.cz_id,c.cz_name,c.xt_type, x.xd_id,x.xd_name, t1.id as t1_id, create_by, create_time, modified_by, modified_time, reason_analysis, treatment_measure, data_feature, fault_equipment
mapper.select:
select
from alarm a INNER JOIN mro_quduan_base qb ON a.station_id = qb.cz_id AND a.section_id = qb.qdid INNER JOIN mro_chezhan c ON a.station_id = c.cz_id INNER JOIN mro_xianduan x ON c.xd_cz_id = x.xid INNER JOIN mro_dianwuduan d ON x.dwd_xd_id=d.did INNER JOIN mro_tieluju t ON d.tlj_dwd_id=t.tid LEFT OUTER JOIN alarm_ticket t1 on a.alarm_ticket_id = t1.id where dispose_status=1 OR dispose_status=2
